function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Air conditioning contributing to the spread of the virus in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission in indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Use air ventilation and conditioning systems on a non-recirculation mode","Technologies":"Non-recirculating air ventilation and conditioning systems","People":"Indoor occupants, construction workers","Owner":"Building owners, infrastructure authorities"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of construction workers to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 infection among construction workers","Mitigation":"Implement measures to protect the health and safety of construction workers, reduce reliance on public transportation","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment, health and safety protocols, alternative transportation options","People":"Construction workers, public transportation authorities","Owner":"Government, private transportation agencies"},{"Description":"Decreased demand for public transportation impacting construction projects","Impact":"Challenges in sustaining construction projects due to decreased demand for public transportation","Mitigation":"Cooperative efforts to ensure safe and reliable public transportation, support for construction workers' employment","Technologies":"Innovative urban planning, sustainable transportation solutions","People":"Construction workers, public transportation authorities, policy makers, end-users","Owner":"Government, public transportation agencies"}]}
